name: Dragon Slaying
description:
This is a CG+ casual control game. Use the mouse to control the strength of the jump. If the power is too small, it will not jump to the next platform. If the power is too large, it will cross the next platform. Only by jumping to the next platform can you survive.

You can get a certain amount of gold coins every time you jump on a platform, and you can get the most gold coins when you jump to the middle of the platform; you can launch a shock wave at the dragon every time you jump on a platform; 50 gold coins can buy a super shock wave, or a chance to resurrect.

After defeating the dragon, you can rescue the imprisoned girl. Endless mode can challenge your limits.
